Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Business Healthcare Management Honours Degree
Description: Combines business management principles with the specific needs of the healthcare industry.
Requirements: ND/HND in a Business-related field or any relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Business Management Honours Degree
Description: Provides a comprehensive understanding of business operations and management strategies.
Requirements: ND/HND in Business Studies, Accountancy, Purchasing, Banking and Finance and Secretarial Studies or any other relevant Qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Consumer and Marketing Intelligence Honours Degree
Description: Focuses on understanding consumer behavior and developing data-driven marketing strategies.
Requirements: ND/HND in Marketing Management, or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Data Science and Informatics Honours Degree
Description: Integrates data science techniques with business informatics for informed decision-making.
Requirements: ND/HND in an Information Technology related field or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment in the field of IT.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Economics and Econometric Modelling Honours Degree
Description: Applies economic theories and econometric models to analyze economic phenomena.
Requirements: ND/HND in a Business-related field or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and at least a 'B' pass in 'O' level Mathematics and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Finance and Digital Banking Honours Degree
Description: Focuses on financial management and the evolving landscape of digital banking.
Requirements: ND/HND in Banking and Finance related field or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subject and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Financial Economics and Investment Honours Degree
Description: Combines financial economics with investment strategies and portfolio management.
Requirements: ND/HND in a Business-related field or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Logistics and Supply Chain Management Honours Degree
Description: Covers the planning, implementation, and control of efficient flow and storage of goods and services.
Requirements: ND/HND in Logistics, Retail, Procurement or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes at 'A' Level and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Risk Management and Insurance Honours Degree
Description: Focuses on identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks, and the principles of insurance.
Requirements: Diploma or Advanced Diploma in Insurance, ND/HND in Business Studies or any other relevant qualification or: At least two passes in relevant 'A' Level subjects and: Confirmation of employment.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Tourism and Hospitality Management Honours Degree
Description: Provides a comprehensive understanding of the tourism and hospitality industries.
Requirements: ND/HND in Tourism, Hospitality, Customer Care, Marketing, Professional Cookery, Tour Guiding or any other relevant qualification or: At least two 'A' Level passes and: Confirmation of employment in any tourism-related or hospitality organisation.

Name: Bachelor of Commerce in Sustainable Tourism Management Honours Degree
Description: Focuses on developing and managing tourism practices that are environmentally and socially responsible.
Requirements: Two 'A' Level passes in any subject.
